Whenever a player casts a spell named Fatigue, put a +1/+1 counter on Class Bully.
Whenever a player casts a spell, if it’s not the first spell that they’ve cast this turn, that player conjures a card named Fatigue on the top of their library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
